name: 2-Ethyloxirane
Reason: 2-Ethyloxirane has a melting point influenced by the functional groups in the molecule relative to the base melting point of ethane, which is around -114.0°C. The presence of two ethyl groups can increase the melting point due to the additional molecular weight and van der Waals interactions, with an approximate increase of +20°C per group, totaling +40°C.
